item.title: Lord Krishna under a tree
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Product Description An imagination artartist on a art of Krishna sitting under tree. Art Category – Madhubani Painting – is a traditional folk art style, practiced since time immemorial in the Mithila region of janakpur Nepal.This style is unique due to its brilliant miniature designs, ancient origin, and themes are drawn mainly from Mithila mythology…

Read More
item.content:encoded:
Product Description
An imagination artartist on a art of Krishna sitting under tree.

Art Category – Madhubani Painting – is a traditional folk art style, practiced since time immemorial in the Mithila region of janakpur Nepal.This style is unique due to its brilliant miniature designs, ancient origin, and themes are drawn mainly from Mithila mythology and present-day rural life. This art is practiced in villages ofmithila mostly by women artists.
